website_summaries.verdict: The Xbox 360 remains a great video and gaming console, but fans will be better served by older 360 bundles -- or waiting for the Xbox One.
pros: The Xbox 360 E delivers a fantastic library of media and games, along with slightly quieter operation than the previous 360 model
cons: The 360 E loses the optical audio output found on previous Xbox models
requires annual Xbox Live Gold subscription for nearly all online gaming and entertainment apps
older 360 hardware/software bundles remain a better value.
The newer Xbox One is just around the corner

customer_reviews.title: The company will make sure you are satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my adapted PE students. After a week I smelled smoke and the Xbox would not work. I noticed some liquid coming out of the ac power adapter. Long story short, I contacted the company and they were more than willing to make things right. They shipped me another adapter and I have not had any problems since.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the XBox - Very happy with Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Although we are very happy with our experience with Amazon, we are not happy with the purchase of the XBox 360. It is not user-friendly. You have to pay too many extra fees. And there are not enough games for families that do not play violent games. The fact that you have to pay for access to Netflix and Hulu Plus when I already pay those companies a fee should give a good indication of the swindling Microsoft tries to pull on unsuspecting people. Given the chance, we would not buy this product again. But, Amazon has been awesome!
customer_reviews.author: T.M.P.B.

customer_reviews.title: faulty product
customer_reviews.text: not safe to buy products from amazon through credit card. Automatically deducting thr money for the faulty products. My child bought an x box using my credit card the piece was faulty. amazon again sent another unit which too was not working. it deducted the amount for the second unit from my credit card using the information i initially entered . very disappointed by the services. it is very truw that one should not buy online using credit card as they misuse the details shared by you and the data with them is not confidential.
customer_reviews.author: harsh jain

product_meta.title: Microsoft XBOX 360 E 4GB Console with Kinect Sensor
product_meta.description:
The Xbox 360 Console with Kinect. Kinect brings games and entertainment to life in extraordinary new ways–no controller required. Easy to use and instantly fun, Kinect gets everyone off the couch moving, laughing, and cheering. See a ball? Kick it. Control a HD movie with the wave of the hand. Want to join a friend in the fun? Simply jump in. Wi-Fi is built-in for easier connection to the world of entertainment on Xbox LIVE, where HD movies and TV stream in an instant. Xbox 360 is more games, entertainment, and fun.

The new Xbox 360 4GB console with Kinect has built-in wi-fi, a black wireless controller, a standard definition composite A/V cable, a Kinect Sensor, the Kinect Adventures game, and free one-month Xbox LIVE Gold membership.

Xbox 360 E 4GB console with Kinect
view larger  * Xbox 360 E Console: The new console is sleeker and quieter with a stylish design that will be the centerpiece of your home entertainment system.
 * Xbox 360 4GB Hard Drive: The internal 4GB hard drive allows you to save your games and store television shows, movies, music, pictures, trailers, levels, demos, and more extras available from Xbox LIVE Marketplace.
 * Built-in Wi-Fi: The new Xbox 360 has 802.11n Wi-Fi built in for a faster and easier connection to Xbox LIVE. Download or stream HD movies, TV episodes, and games from Xbox LIVE Marketplace in 1080p and 5.1 surround sound from anywhere in the house.1
 * Kinect Ready: Kinect makes you the controller. With a dedicated, specialized port, the Xbox 360 E 4GB is built to connect seamlessly with the Kinect sensor and have you up off the couch and into the world of Kinect in no time.
 * Xbox 360 Wireless Controller: This award-winning, high-performance wireless controller features the Xbox Guide Button for quick, in-game access to friends and music. It has a range of up to 30 feet and a battery life of 30 hours on two AA batteries.
 * Xbox 360 Composite A/V cable: Use Xbox 360 on standard-definition televisions using this connection over traditional composite connectors. Play high-quality audio with the included stereo connector.
 * Xbox LIVE: Xbox LIVE brings a whole world of entertainment possibility right to your Xbox 360. Play with friends online, and watch streaming movies and TV from Zune and Netflix, all in crystal-clear HD. Watch live sporting events and check out highlights from your favorite teams on ESPN. You'll find loads of your favorite music from Last.fm and the ability to connect with friends on Facebook and Twitter, right on the best screen in the house.

1 Compatible with b/g/n networks

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
Q: What is this new console?
A: We have redesigned the console to update the look to bring it in line with the Xbox family. With this updated design, we are aligning the Xbox 360 closer to the Xbox One's look.

Q: Is Xbox 360 E backward compatible?
A: Yes. Xbox 360 E is backward compatible with all Xbox 360 original game titles. Most Xbox 360 Original accessories are also compatible.

Q: Can I use my old power supply for the Xbox 360 S with the new Xbox 360 E or vice versa?
A: No, because there is a change in the power supply configuration. That said, every new Xbox 360 comes with its own power supply.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * Xbox 360 E Black Console
 * 4GB Hard Drive
 * 1 Black Wireless Controller
 * 1 month of Xbox LIVE Gold
 * Kinect Adventures game
 * Composite A/V Cable 3.5MM
